data.title: Blood For Dust: All you may want to know about Kit Harington starrer crime thriller’s premiere date, plot, cast, trailer and crew
data.meta_description: In Blood for Dust, Scoot McNairy plays Gus, a salesman in financial trouble who reunites with his old friend Ricky, played by Kit Harington. Ricky, involved in illegal activities, leads Gus into a dangerous world of crime, where they face escalating risks and consequences.
data.text:
Synopsis

In Blood for Dust, Scoot McNairy plays Gus, a salesman in financial trouble who reunites with his old friend Ricky, played by Kit Harington. Ricky, involved in illegal activities, leads Gus into a dangerous world of crime, where they face escalating risks and consequences.

Kit Harington, known for his role in Game of Thrones, stars in the upcoming crime thriller Blood for Dust. The film's trailer, released recently, introduces the gritty world of crime and friendship turned sour.

Plot, Cast

Scoot McNairy and Kit Harington, known for their diverse roles, join forces as old friends in Blood for Dust. McNairy portrays Gus, a struggling salesman, while Harington transforms into Ricky, a character immersed in the underworld of illegal trades. Joining McNairy and Harington are Josh Lucas, Ethan Suplee and Stephen Dorff.

Trailer

The trailer offers a glimpse into the dark and dangerous world Gus enters with Ricky. From strip clubs to back roads, the duo finds themselves entangled in a web of crime, where every decision comes at a cost.

Crew

The film is directed by Rod Blackhurst, known for his work in true-crime documentaries, and written by David Ebeltoft.

Premiere Date

Blood for Dust is set to premiere on April 19, 2024, in select theaters and digital platforms. Fans can also look forward to seeing McNairy in The Line and Harington in Eternal Return and the third season of Industry.

FAQs:

Who stars in 'Blood for Dust'?

Scoot McNairy and Kit Harington lead the cast. Josh Lucas, Ethan Suplee, and Stephen Dorff also star in the crime thriller.

When does 'Blood for Dust' premiere?

The film premieres in select theaters and on digital platforms on April 19, 2024.
